mapper.select: select U.GENDER,count(1) from B_STUDENT_INFO SI left JOIN B_USER U on SI.USER_ID = U.USER_ID where SI.AT_SCHOOL = 1 and SI.STATE = '10A' GROUP BY U.GENDER

select BSI.USER_ID,BDI.DORMITORY_ID,BDI.BUILDING_ID from B_STUDENT_INFO BSI left join B_DORMITORY_USER BDU on BSI.USER_ID = BDU.USER_ID left join B_DORMITORY_INFO BDI on BDU.DORMITORY_ID = BDI.DORMITORY_ID left join B_BUILDING_INFO BBI on BBI.BUILDING_ID = BDI.BUILDING_ID order by BBI.BUILDING_ID,BDI.DORMITORY_ID asc

select USER_ID from B_STUDENT_INFO BSI ,B_USER BU where BSI.STATE = '10A' and BSI.AT_SCHOOL = 1 and BSI.USER_ID = BU.USER_ID
and (BU.USER_NAME like #{nameOrCode} or BU.CODE like #{nameOrCode})
and BSI.USER_ID in ( select USER_ID from B_USER_CLASS where CLASS_ID in ( select CLASS_ID from B_USER_CLASS where USER_ID = #{instructorId} ) )
